column4: so - if I swap motherboards/processors on my Jaunty server from a 32but CPU to a 64, can I update without a complete reinstall?
yes.. but you can't upgrade to a 64bit version of ubuntu.. but your 64bit processor will run the 32bit version
that'll do, TBH. All I want is rid of the crappy VIA chipset ethernet on the current board
linux/ubuntu is pretty tolerant with switching hardware.. as long as you're on the same architecture.. ie you'll get problems if you try switching from ppc to x86 or similar
